info.name: platform-microservices-utils
info.summary: This is an utilities for microservices in a SaaS product named Platform.

info.author: Vishwajeet Kale
info.name: platform-microservices-utils
info.summary: "Platform Microservices Utils is a comprehensive Python package designed to streamline microservice communication. With a focus on security and efficiency, this package offers a range of utilities including microservice client requests, header builders, middleware such as microservice token validators, URL builders, and an INI parser. Simplify your microservice architecture and enhance communication reliability with Platform Microservices Utils.
